NewsHero.title: Voice of the Field
NewsHero.subtitle: News, updates, and trends from Grupo Terminel. Stay informed about the agro-industry in Sinaloa.

ServicesPage.meta_title: Services - Terminel Group | Storage, Mill and Los Valles Plant
ServicesPage.meta_desc: Comprehensive agro-industrial services: 110,000 ton storage, Hernando de Villafa√±e Mill, Los Valles Plant (8 ton/h), financing and technical advice.
ServicesPage.meta_keywords: Grain Storage Sinaloa, Flour Mill Guasave, Los Valles Plant, Agricultural Services, Agricultural Financing

2.title: Terminel Group signs strategic alliance with Asgrow for 2026 season
2.excerpt: We strengthen our premium seed offering for producers with the best white maize varieties adapted to the Sinaloa climate.

3.title: Modernization of silos in Bamoa: Greater storage capacity
3.excerpt: $15 million investment improves infrastructure and increases capacity by an additional 20,000 tons.

4.title: Local producers exceed 2025 chickpea harvest expectations
4.excerpt: Don Miguel Torres from Ruiz Cortines achieved yield of 3.2 ton/ha with technical advice from our agronomy team.

5.title: Favorable forecast: Rainy season will benefit spring-summer cycle
5.excerpt: Regional climate analysis indicates optimal conditions for maize and beans in the coming months.

6.title: International corn price reaches all-time high in January
6.excerpt: International markets favor Mexican exports. Analysis of opportunities for producers.

7.title: Terminel Group receives Great Place to Work 2024 certification
7.excerpt: Recognition highlights our commitment to the well-being of over 200 collaborators across the region.

8.title: New digital training for producers: Terminel Portal 2.0
8.excerpt: We launch free online training program on agricultural technology, planting management, and marketing for all our allies.

9.title: We celebrate Producer Day with over 500 farmers from the region
9.excerpt: Annual event gathered producers from Guasave, Los Mochis, and Bamoa with keynote lectures on agricultural innovation and networking.

10.title: Alert: Recommendations for possible drought period in March
10.excerpt: Our meteorological team suggests efficient irrigation strategies and resistant varieties to mitigate climate risks.

11.title: Record export: Sinaloa chickpea breaks figures in Asian markets
11.excerpt: India and Turkey increase demand by 35% compared to previous year. Historic opportunity for local producers.

12.title: Success Story: Mendoza family doubles production with precision agriculture
12.excerpt: Implementation of GPS technology and moisture sensors increased yield from 8 to 17 ton/ha in maize cultivation.

13.title: Terminel Group launches scholarship program for producers' children
13.excerpt: $2 million investment in education: 50 full scholarships for careers in agronomy, engineering, and administration.

article.title: Terminel Group inaugurates modern 'Los Valles' packaging plant in 2026
article.excerpt: With an investment exceeding $50 million pesos, the new ISO 22000:2018 certified plant will revolutionize our basic grain packaging process, expanding our production capacity and generating over 100 direct jobs in the region.
article.author: Terminel Group

PriceAlerts.title: Real-Time Price Alerts
PriceAlerts.intro: Receive instant notifications when the prices of your crops reach the value you are looking for. Never miss a sales opportunity.
PriceAlerts.success_desc: We will notify you when the price of <bold>{crop}</bold> reaches <bold>${price}/ton</bold>.

features.realtime_desc: Prices updated every hour from national and international markets.
features.instant_desc: Receive alerts in less than 5 minutes when the price reaches your target.
features.free_desc: No hidden costs. Exclusive service for producers associated with Terminel.

InteractiveSiloMap.title: Our Collection Centers
InteractiveSiloMap.description: Find the collection center closest to you. All our silos are strategically located with direct access to main roads.
InteractiveSiloMap.footer_desc: Our 4 collection centers are strategically located in the northern region of Sinaloa, guaranteeing complete coverage for producers in the Guasave Valley and Los Mochis. <green>Share your exact location</green> and we will help you find the nearest center.

guasave-centro.name: Guasave Center
guasave-centro.address: 100th St. and Rd. to Las Glorias, Guasave, Sinaloa

ruiz-cortines.name: Pinitos Warehouse
ruiz-cortines.address: International Hwy km 168+500, Ruiz Cortines, Sinaloa

los-mochis.name: Flor Azul Warehouse
los-mochis.address: International Hwy and Flor Azul, Ahome, Sinaloa

MolinoSection.title: Hernando de Villafa√±e Mill
MolinoSection.intro: Founded in 1987 by Don Enrique Terminel Fonseca, our mill produces <green>high-quality wheat flours</green> with state-of-the-art technology.
MolinoSection.description: With a storage capacity of 28,000 tons and processing of 4,200 tons monthly, we have consolidated regional brands recognized for their consistency and quality.
MolinoSection.modernization_desc: Complete update of milling equipment with precision technology that guarantees uniform and excellent quality flours for industrial and domestic baking.

LosVallesSection.title: "Los Valles" Packaging Plant
LosVallesSection.subtitle: Our most recent investment in infrastructure, fulfilling Don Enrique Terminel's dream of adding value beyond traditional storage

processing.title: Fast Processing
processing.desc: 8 tons per hour with cutting-edge technology

quality.title: Quality Control
quality.desc: Cleaning and drying with ISO standards

LosVallesSection.quote: "This plant represents our commitment to the agricultural development of Sinaloa. We not only process grains, we generate opportunities for hundreds of producer families."

ComplementaryServices.title: Complementary Services
ComplementaryServices.subtitle: Because we understand that agricultural success requires more than storage, we offer a complete support ecosystem

financing.title: Agricultural Financing
financing.desc: Enabling credits, payment advances, and price guarantees to maximize your cash flow during the agricultural cycle.

advisory.title: Technical Advisory
advisory.desc: Expert agronomists who accompany you from sowing to harvest, optimizing yields with scientific basis.

supplies.title: Supplies Distribution
supplies.desc: Alliances with the best global brands: Asgrow seeds, Yara fertilizers, and precision nutrition.

insurance.title: Insurance Funds
insurance.desc: Protection against climatic risks and guarantees that back your investment and effort.

ComplementaryServices.cta_desc: Join more than 400 producers who trust Grupo Terminel for their agricultural operations

AcopioSection.title: Massive Storage
AcopioSection.description_1: With a storage capacity of <green>110,000 tons</green>, our collection centers are strategically located to serve more than 400 producers throughout Sinaloa.
AcopioSection.description_2: Modern infrastructure on the Mexico 15 highway that speeds up national and international distribution. Certified weighing systems and rigorous quality control at every entry.

ToolsHero.title: Technology at the Service of the Field
ToolsHero.subtitle: Practical tools designed to maximize your profitability and facilitate your agricultural decisions

ServicesHero.title: Complete Solutions for the Countryside
ServicesHero.subtitle: From storage to industrialization, we offer a complete value chain that maximizes your profitability

Certifications.title: Certifications and Recognitions
Certifications.description: Our commitment to excellence is backed by international certifications and recognitions that validate our quality and responsibility
Certifications.cta_text: Our commitment to quality and responsibility is constant. We continue working to maintain and exceed these standards.

gptw.title: Great Place to Work
gptw.desc: First company in Guasave certified as a great place to work. This recognition validates our commitment to the well-being, professional development, and inclusion of our team.

iso.title: ISO 22000:2018
iso.desc: International certification in food safety management, guaranteeing the safety of our products from collection to final delivery to the consumer.

esr.title: Socially Responsible Company
esr.desc: Distinction awarded for our commitment to social responsibility, environmental care, and business ethics in all our operations.

alejandro.name: Alejandro Terminel Rojo
alejandro.bio_1: Son of founder Enrique Terminel Fonseca, Alejandro leads the second generation of Grupo Terminel with a clear vision: to add value beyond traditional storage and strengthen the Sinaloan countryside.
alejandro.bio_2: Under his direction, the company has achieved significant milestones such as the inauguration of Los Valles Plant, Great Place to Work certification, and the expansion of chickpea exports to more than 15 countries.
alejandro.quote: "Building Los Valles fulfilled my father's dream of generating more value for our producers. We remain committed to the agricultural development of Sinaloa."

enrique.name: Enrique Terminel Fonseca
enrique.bio_1: Visionary entrepreneur who in the 70s identified the agricultural potential of the Guasave Valley. With the support of local collaborators, he began the purchase and sale of grains that eventually consolidated as the current Grupo Terminel.
enrique.bio_2: His legacy includes the founding of Molino Hernando de Villafa√±e in 1987 and the proprietary brands "La Trinidad" and "Don Enrique", which are today synonymous with quality in the region.

AboutHero.title: Our History
AboutHero.story_desc: A family journey of more than five decades strengthening the Sinaloan countryside with vision, commitment, and tangible results

Hero.description: Agro-industrial leader in grain collection, processing, and marketing. Exporting Sinaloan quality to more than 15 countries with ISO 22000:2018 certification.

ImpactMetrics.title: Impact by the Numbers
ImpactMetrics.description: More than five decades strengthening the Mexican countryside with tangible results
ImpactMetrics.cta_text: Discover how we can boost your agricultural production

ServicesOverview.description: From collection to industrialization, we offer complete solutions to maximize the value of your production

services.acopio_desc: Storage capacity of 110,000 tons with strategic infrastructure throughout Sinaloa.
services.molino_desc: Production of high-quality wheat flours since 1987 with regionally recognized brands.
services.planta_desc: New 2026 facility for cleaning, drying, and packaging with cutting-edge technology.

ServicesOverview.complementary_desc: Agricultural financing, technical advice, input distribution (Asgrow, Yara), and assurance funds to guarantee the success of your harvest

TrustIndicators.title: Trust that Transcends
TrustIndicators.description: Our commitment to quality, social responsibility, and sustainable development is backed by international certifications

certifications.iso_desc: Certification in food safety management and international standards
certifications.esr_desc: ESR distinction in recognition of our social and environmental commitment
certifications.sustainability_desc: Sustainable and environmentally responsible agricultural practices

quote.text: Building the Los Valles Plant fulfilled my father's dream of adding value beyond traditional collection. We remain committed to strengthening the Sinaloa countryside.
